biotools.summary: Laboratory database system we have developed for managing the design, production and hybridization of spotted microarrays. Although it supports the widely used glass microarrays and oligo-chips, it was designed with the specific idiosyncrasies of Nylon based microarrays in mind.

bioschemas.name: MAF
bioschemas.summary: Laboratory database system we have developed for managing the design, production and hybridization of spotted microarrays. Although it supports the widely used glass microarrays and oligo-chips, it was designed with the specific idiosyncrasies of Nylon based microarrays in mind.
